data.title: Vinnie Penn on LinkedIn: At the Movies: ‘Mean Girls’ and ‘American Fiction’
data.meta_description: "You don't even go here" set to music. I'm ALL about it. Plus, "American Fiction" is satire at its best. Watch "At The Movies":…
data.text:
IMO, "Twisters" is superior to the original. I missed Van Halen on the soundtrack, but they plugged in a bad-ass Lainey Wilson ditty. There's also more for horror fans. "Oddity" is a creepy flick from Ireland. Watch this weekend's "At The Movies": https://lnkd.in/egAhh2qt #movies #moviereviewer #entertainmentreporter #weekend #weekendboxoffice #tvhost #tvsegment #atthemovies #wtnh

Slip through the dark side and cross that line....with my interview with John Cafferty & The Beaver Brown Band: https://lnkd.in/epg7TnQD #interview #rocknroll #legend #icon #rhodeisland #podcast #livemusic #newmusic #onthedarkside #eddieandthecruisers #iheartradio #broadcaster #morningradiohost

The guy behind Nicholas Cage's brilliant "Pig" gives us a "Quiet Place" prequel that's actually as beautiful as it is scary. And "Kinds of Kindness" is a freak show. "At The Movies": https://lnkd.in/eNWiYbpj #movies #moviereviewer #entertainmentreporter #weekendboxoffice #prequel #tvhost #tvsegment #atthemovies #wtnh

"It's A Yacht Lobsters Father's Day, Vinnie Penn!" If you love #YachtRock (and who doesn't?), check out my chat with the lead singer of #YachtLobsters. He was on my morning show this week and we discussed who IS Yacht Rock and who ISN'T; I got a few wrong I guess. https://lnkd.in/epmuTycE #music #morningradio #iheartradio #radioshowhost #fathersday #broadcaster #70smusic #podcast

#InsideOut2 is SO funny, so clever, so sharp, and even a little bit heartbreaking. There's also a Henry VIII flick and a Julia Louis-Dreyfus/A24 collab "At The Movies" this #FathersDayWeekend: https://lnkd.in/e-KfRxbN #movies #moviereviewer #entertainmentreporter #tvsegment #tvhost #atthemovies #wtnh #A24

My latest for CT Insider: Chatting up my girl #NikkiGlaser, who returns to Connecticut for not one but TWO shows at #Foxwoods: https://lnkd.in/eX8gBZxG #writer #interview #article #ctinsider #journalist #hearst #comedian

Me & Nikki Glaser. How do YOU think it went? She plays Foxwoods on June 22. Check out our raucous, flirty, filthy interview: https://lnkd.in/eBq5pwbh #comedy #standupcomedy #comedian #interview #morningradioshow #nikkiglaser #podcast #iheartradio #foxwoods

"Life Is Just A Fantasy" 80's rocker Aldo Nova sat down with me to talk Then, Now, and Sunday night at Mohegan Sun with Ace Frehley: https://lnkd.in/e3wxrjJa #interview #radioshowhost #podcast #80srock #triplebill #mohegansun #holidayweekend #livemusic #concert #fantasy #aldonova #iheartradio #broadcaster
